member.name: T:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions
member.summary: The DlnaOptions class contains the user definable parameters for the dlna subsystems.

member.name: M:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.EnablePlayTo
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether gets or sets a value to indicate the status of the dlna playTo subsystem.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.EnableServer
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether gets or sets a value to indicate the status of the dlna server subsystem.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.EnableDebugLog
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether detailed dlna server logs are sent to the console/log. If the setting "Emby.Dlna": "Debug" msut be set in logging.default.json for this property to work.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.EnablePlayToTracing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether whether detailed playTo debug logs are sent to the console/log. If the setting "Emby.Dlna.PlayTo": "Debug" msut be set in logging.default.json for this property to work.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.ClientDiscoveryIntervalSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the ssdp client discovery interval time (in seconds). This is the time after which the server will send a ssdp search request.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.AliveMessageIntervalSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the frequency at which ssdp alive notifications are transmitted.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.BlastAliveMessageIntervalSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the frequency at which ssdp alive notifications are transmitted. MIGRATING - TO BE REMOVED ONCE WEB HAS BEEN ALTERED.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.DefaultUserId
member.summary: Gets or sets the default user account that the dlna server uses.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.AutoCreatePlayToProfiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether playTo device profiles should be created.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.BlastAliveMessages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to blast alive messages.

member.name: P:Emby.Dlna.Configuration.DlnaOptions.SendOnlyMatchedHost
member.summary: gets or sets a value indicating whether to send only matched host.
